ExecError = OSError

LogFn = proc (res: ProcResult)
Source   Edit   
OnErrorFn = proc (res: ProcResult): Future[ProcResult]
Source   Edit   
ProcArgs = ref object
  prefixCmd* = []
  options* = {QuoteArgs, ShowCommand, Interactive, CaptureOutput,
              CaptureOutputErr, WithLogging}
  env*: ProcEnv
  workingDir* = ""
  processName* = ""
  logFn*: LogFn
  onErrorFn*: OnErrorFn
  input*: AsyncIoBase
  output*: AsyncIoBase
  outputErr*: AsyncIoBase
Source   Edit   
ProcArgsModifier = object
  prefixCmd*: Option[seq[string]]
  toAdd*: set[ProcOption]
  toRemove*: set[ProcOption]
  input*: Option[AsyncIoBase]
  output*: Option[AsyncIoBase]
  outputErr*: Option[AsyncIoBase]
  env*: Option[ProcEnv]
  envModifier*: Option[ProcEnv] ## envModifier don't replace the original one, but is merged with it
  workingDir*: Option[string]
  processName*: Option[string]
  logFn*: Option[LogFn]
  onErrorFn*: Option[OnErrorFn]
Source   Edit   
ProcOption = enum
  Interactive, QuoteArgs, MergeStderr, CaptureOutput, CaptureOutputErr,
  CaptureInput, NoParentEnv, Daemon, DryRun, ShowCommand, AskConfirmation,
  WithLogging, SetEnvOnCmdLine, KeepStreamOpen
Source   Edit   
ProcResult = ref object
  cmd*: seq[string]
  output*: string
  outputErr*: string
  input*: string
  success*: bool
  exitCode*: int
  options*: set[ProcOption]
Source   Edit  

Lets

internalCmd = ProcArgsModifier(toAdd: {CaptureOutputErr}, toRemove: {
    Interactive, MergeStderr, ShowCommand, CaptureInput, CaptureOutput})
Source   Edit   
sh = ProcArgs(prefixCmd: [], options: {QuoteArgs, ShowCommand, Interactive,
                                       CaptureOutput, CaptureOutputErr,
                                       WithLogging}, workingDir: "",
              processName: "")

    ...stackTrace: false, raises: [Exception, ValueError], tags: [RootEffect],
    forbids: [].}
If ProcResult is unsuccessful, try to replace it by OnErrorFn callback If onErrorFn is unsuccessful or doesn't exists, raise an ExecError Source   Edit

proc merge(allResults: varargs[ProcResult]): ProcResult {....raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Add together captured streams, keep the max exitCode If one result is not a success, all while be unsuccessful But discard following args: options, onErrorFn Source   Edit

    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}

proc merge[T: ProcArgs or ProcArgsModifier](a: T; prefixCmd = none(seq[string]);
    toAdd: set[ProcOption] = {}; toRemove: set[ProcOption] = {};
    input = none(AsyncIoBase); output = none(AsyncIoBase);
    outputErr = none(AsyncIoBase); env = none(ProcEnv);
    envModifier = none(ProcEnv); workingDir = none(string);
    processName = none(string); logFn = none(LogFn); onErrorFn = none(OnErrorFn)): T
